name: PETALI
description:
PETALI - Luxury knitted petal necklace in apricot, marled grey with black tip

Inspired by naturally occurring symmetry, man-made symbols and ancient cultures, this piece of my collection takes it's form from the idea of adorning yourself with the natural environment. This hand-loomed knitted necklace is designed to be worn day or night, yet still stands out as a bold statement piece.

Using the highest quality merino, lambswool and lambswool mixed with silk on my big and beautiful Italian knitting machine, this necklace feels as good as it looks.

The individual petals suspend from an antique look bronze chain, which is nickel and lead free, and fastens together with a bronze lobster clasp

Your necklace will arrive to you carefully packaged in a black gift box, protected in a padded envelope

name: GRAMMIA
description:
Inspired by naturally occurring symmetry, man-made symbols and ancient cultures, this hand-loomed knitted necklace is designed to be worn day or night, yet still stands out as a bold statement piece.

Using the highest quality merino, lambswool and brushed cottons on my big and beautiful Italian knitting machine, this necklace feels as good as it looks! Using a monochrome pallet, and an intricate trim, this necklace really fits in with the unstoppable tribal trend.


The pieces suspends from an antique look bronze chain, which is nickel and lead free, and fastens together with a bronze lobster clasp


Your necklace will arrive to you carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and brown paper, all protected in a padded envelope


MEASUREMENTS

Width - 10cm
Height - 8cm
Chain Length (from back of neck) - 17cm with 5cm extension chain


*This item is made to order, your necklace may take up to 7 days to be made and posted

name: PAPILIO
description:

Inspired by naturally occurring symmetry, man-made symbols and ancient cultures, this hand-loomed knitted necklace is designed to be worn day or night, yet still stands out as a bold statement piece.

This large piece suspend from an antique look bronze chain, which is nickel and lead free, and fastens together with a bronze lobster clasp

Your necklace will arrive to you carefully packaged in a black gift box, protected in a padded envelope

name: ANTHE
description:
Using the highest quality merino, lambswool and brushed cottons on my big and beautiful Italian knitting machine, this necklace feels as good as it looks! Using black, charcoal and ice blue to create chevron patterning with a mustard tip, and an intricate trim, this necklace really fits in with the unstoppable tribal trend.

The pieces suspends from an antique look bronze chain, which is nickel and lead free, and fastens together with a bronze lobster clasp


Your necklace will arrive to you carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and brown paper, all protected in a padded envelope


MEASUREMENTS

Width - 10cm
Height - 8cm
Chain Length (from back of neck) - 17cm with 5cm extension chain


*This item is made to order, your necklace may take up to 7 days to be made and posted*

(Please note that all the items in my shop are handmade by myself, so every one will have their slight unique differences. In my eyes this is the beauty of buying handmade! Also be aware that the colours may vary slightly depending on your computer screen)

name: HUERNIA
description:
'Dark Grape' 

Inspired by naturally occurring symmetry, man-made symbols and ancient cultures, this hand-loomed knitted necklace is designed to be worn day or night, yet still stands out as a bold statement piece.

Using the highest quality merino, lambswool and brushed cottons on my big and beautiful Italian knitting machine, this necklace feels as good as it looks! Using dark grape, black and charcoal, this is a beautiful wintery piece, and works perfectly under a collared shirt, over a pain tee or dressed up with a LBD 


The pieces suspends from an antique look bronze chain, which is nickel and lead free, and fastens together with a bronze lobster clasp


Your necklace will arrive to you carefully wrapped in acid free tissue paper and brown paper, all protected in a padded envelope
